fields.Name: Entity List to Editpad - Action as Tool
fields.Description: Computer Use test that exercises MJ Action-as-Tool integration without external API keys. Opens editpad.org, invokes the Get Entity List action (exposed as a tool) to retrieve MJ entities filtered to the __mj schema, pastes the first 5 entity names into the text editor

InputDefinition.goal: Navigate to https://www.editpad.org/. Once the page loads, use the Get_Entity_List tool to retrieve MemberJunction entities with SchemaFilter set to '__mj'. From the results, take the names of the first 5 entities and type them as a numbered list into the main text editor area on editpad.org.
